title: Is American Airlines Taking Precautions Against Pro-Trump Rioters Leaving DC?
subtitle: Reports of politically motivated aggression on flights before the mob violence at the U.S. Capitol raised security concerns.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: American Airlines has enforced new precautions in response to the pro-Trump mob violence in the U.S. Capitol on Jan. 6, 2021, and related aggression on flights.
